Text: If you are a Bruce Willis fan, then THIS MOVIE SUCKS A DEAD MAN'S BALLS!!!  I won't spoil it, but trust me, you will not just be disappointed, you will be ANGRY!!!

Actually, I liked this movie. This is not a 'Bruce Willis" movie insofar as Bruce hogging up the screen. It is similiar to "The Cold Light of Day" where Bruce is simply playing a supporting role in the movie. The casting is excellent. The storyline you may like. Production values are high and production design is superb. It's a good watch.

A=9
V=9
M=8
